content: **grab a boring zip pouch and some pretty yarn you ll have a gorgeous new bag in no time ** * easy pattern- ideal for beginners or anyone looking for a quick colorful project * all the benefits of having a lined bag but you only have to attach it not make it from scratch * make any size- use it for projects pencils cosmetics anything * cute and useful- perfect for gifting * great stashbuster * perfect little travel project * it s free i hope you enjoy this pattern as much as i do i can t wait to see your finished objects
